QuestData.Title: The Horror Comes A-Rising
QuestData.Description: We are protected from the mantid. Such was the agreement made so many millennia ago.$b$bThere are forces from which we are not safe, however. The kyparites beneath the ground to the west will haunt us, chase us... even eat us. The mistlurkers eat our kind by the handful.$b$bHelp our people, outsider. Defeat our enemies.
QuestData.RewardText: It is good to have someone of your colossal size in our village.$b$bYou have many uses.
